String.string: Please let me know if you see Aleister.
Execute Killian's henchman Aleister and retrieve General Kanmur's horns. [You must select Labyrinth of Terror (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:253#1501#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]
Return Kanmur's horns to Taronish at the entrance of the Labyrinth of Terror.
